titles.title: To conform Federal tax law with the Texas Constitution to allow for the continued benefit to the fullest extent possible from the financial leverage of the Permanent University Fund to the State of Texas.

To conform Federal tax law with the Texas Constitution to allow for the continued benefit to the fullest extent possible from the financial leverage of the Permanent University Fund to the State of Texas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill updates the effective date of the arbitrage rules for the Permanent University Fund of the state of Texas.
